comments:
hi,

i will testing aspectj and write a simple aspectj project exactly like your weaving demo. standard for my projects ist 1.4. compliance. when i start like your weaving demo with a normal java swing application of me eclipse show in console e sax exception for premature end of file. i change compliance level of both projects to 1.5 and when i start now eclipse is killed with FileNotFoundException and OutOfMemory. my java application is small (under 20 classes). eclipse log at end.

eclipse is running with -Xmx768M and under java 1.6beta. aspectj is fresh installed. eclipse is 3.2.

regards
frank

I suspect this is an issue with Java 6 beta. Can you try with a java 5 or 1.4 jre to confirm this?

I couldn't reproduce this with the latest java 6 beta. If you can still reproduce, please reopen this bug and include your output from "java -version", and also attach your test project if possible. And does it run okay with java 5?
